content:
In the qa report of my IG, there are bunches of broken links errors related to the "item" of Questionnaire or QuestionnaireResponse.
https://build.fhir.org/ig/HL7/davinci-dtr/branches/removeTask/qa.html
I am not sure why the IG publisher is trying to validate the links to those items. If the errors are valid, would appreciate the solution to fix it.
Ignore. There's a template change coming that will address
